When the crowd started booing Rebecca realized she couldn’t wait here any longer. It was time to face the music. She had to for her brother’s sake. Taking a deep breath to steady herself and so the crowd wouldn’t see how much she was shaking, she stepped out into the light and into the arena.

There was a kind of jungle theme going on here. A few trees covered in creepers stood high above the tall grass, but there was enough open space so as not to obstruct the crowd’s view. The grass tipped in a fluffy, almost feathery head that tickled as her hands as she pushed through it.

Luckily for her, her hands were the only thing beneath her shoulders that were exposed, which was more than could be said for her opponent. Ashley was already snickering as the grass brushed against here sides and midriff where her jeans and jacket didn’t quite protect. She didn’t mind admitting she was panicking about this round. If she was laughing before she’d met her opponent that how much worse would it be when-

She realized she was fighting a smaller girl. Who looked a few years younger. Oh thank god. Sure the grass was gonna tickle like hell, but she’d got this- she hoped.

The crowd began murmuring in anticipation as Ashley and Rebecca drew close, neither eager to attack first just in case it was an illusion. Neither were voracious ticklers looking to break the other into submission, but as Ashley grew closer an evil look must’ve crossed her face. Rebecca’s resolve faltered as she realized that this was another battle she probably wasn’t going to win. All she could do was lessen the blow.

“Please.” She whispered, so the crowd couldn’t hear her. “I’m only here because they kidnapped my brother. Go easy on me.”

Jassaya moved out of the tunnel and into the arena. She scanned the area for the first time: a classical looking coliseum with a circular arena. Large pillars were erected in four locations, holding up nothing but giving the contestants something to maneuver around. There were no corners, but one could still be easily backed into one of the columns or a wall if they weren’t careful. The seats filled with what seemed to be wealthy people looking for some entertainment. Jassaya grinned to herself and vowed to give them a good show.

Then she saw her opponent enter from the opposite side. “Hmph, just a human?” Jassaya blurted derisively, loud enough for the other woman to hear. “They must not have wanted a fair fight, did they?” With a confident grin, Jassaya slithered forward, moving slowly but gracefully to the center and closing the distance between the two. The two paused, eyeing each other from about ten feet apart. Jassaya straightened herself up, standing tall on her tail and stretching. “Girl, do you really think you have a chance against someone like me? You might as well just step into my coils now!”

The woman seemed to flinch momentarily, then steel herself. “I’ve handled a tickle dragon and a Queen, I think I can manage ‘someone like you!’” Arya moved herself into a defensive stance, and the two began to circle each other, looking for openings.

Jassaya’s tongue flickered and she looked the woman over, noticing her beautiful form, and her plentiful exposed skin. “Mmm, such a lovely woman… I will enjoy playing with you...” Jassaya hissed huskily, as if already envisioning her victory, the girl weak from laughter and locked in her coils.

“Funny, I was just thinking the same thing about you!” Arya retorted, prompting an annoyed hiss from the naga. Both of them watched the other closely for the slightest opening that would expose them to the quick movement of tickling hands.
12211.title: It begins.

choices: She didn't actually have a plan...
122112.content:
Jassaya waited for Arya to loose paitence and charge her, and thats just what she did. Jassaya coiled up, assumeing a defensive position until Arya got close enough for her attack to work.

It was a sight to see for the spectators in the audience, Jassaya seemingly instantly ended up on top of Arya. In reality she had simply waited until Arya was too close to jump away, then used her powerful tail muscles to lunge at her, hitting her center mass and throwing her to the floor. It was a simple matter from there to coil her tail around the human.

"You were aiming for my tail weren't you? You are aware of what scales are right? You wouldn't have tickled me anyways!" Jassaya taunted her prey as she stood her up. Her tail had wrapped around Arya's arms so that they would be held at her sides, which helped the lamia to remove the corset. As soon as she had undone the knot she simply pulled the dress up and off of Arya's body, exposing the flesh of the ticklish human to Jassaya and the roaring audience.

Arya shivered in the lamia's coil, even the slight movements of the tail coiling around her sent a shock up her spine. "I have to say, I expected more out of you" the lamia taunted. "You havn't won yet snake!" Arya retorted.
122112.title: Jassaya closes the distance, and lands the open...

1221121.content:
A quiet settled over the arena as spectators leaned forward to get a better view of what would surely be an epic fight. Jassaya braced herself to disengage incase of escape, and Arya just struggled pitifully against the strong tail muscles that held her in place.

"You didn't actually have a plan did you human." Jassaya said with a small amount of dissapointment. "Oh well, lets see how ticklish those underarms are!" Like lightning Jassaya opened an area just enough to fit Arya's arms through before grabbing her wrists and forcing them through, locking Arya into a T-pose.

Jassaya dragged a finger along each of Arya's pits, making the women cry out into laughter and squirm against Jassaya's tail. "Already? Darling, i've hardly touched you!" Jassaya taunted as she added a second finger to each pit and began to use her nails. Arya exploded into laughter and tried to move her arms, but the tail lock was firm and she couldn't manuver at all.

Jassaya lifted Arya so her face was at stomach level, then shifted her tail so she could access her belly. She moved in and toyed with Arya's navel with her forked tounge, utterly breaking the woman. "I submit!" Arya cried out and Jassaya stopped to give her a break.

"This is what your empire throws at me? A disgrace hardly befiting my attention, she would however do well as a pet, will you allow me to keep this failure?" Jassaya called out to the queen. The thouroghly dissapointed queen waved her on then left the building in disgust of how quickly her project had failed.
1221121.title: She didn't actually have a plan...

choices: Arya begins her run and tickle strategy
122113.content:
The naga princess and royal tickler continued to circle each other without breaking eye contact- neither wanting to attack without thinking through their plan. On the outside Arya managed the illusion of a fearless challenger with no concern about fighting a giant snake monster. Inside her head a voice was screaming with horror that she was fighting a giant snake monster.

As the two circled she forced herself to try and remain calm. She didn’t know a lot about nagas, but she knew they were slow- slow but impossible to escape from once caught in their coils. Her best strategy was to keep her distance and wear her down.

Jassaya on the other hand was keeping her distance too. Her opponent’s remarks gave her reason to hold off for a second. She didn’t know what a tickle dragon was, but it sounded like a fearsome creature not to be taken lightly. And who was this girl to face royalty in a competition like this? Perhaps there was more to her than met the eye.

Even so, she was thinking about how the human looked like an irresistible little toy if she could get her hands and coils on her- whilst Arya wondered how many seconds it would take to reduce the naga princess to hysterical tears.

As their footprints and tracks in the sand grew deeper in the circle they moved around each other, so did the anticipation of the first strike.
122113.title: Round and round the arena...

choices: All it takes is one wrong move...
Seeing an opening, Arya leaps onto Jassaya's back!
1221131.content:
Arya realized that if she was going to have any chance at winning against her stronger opponent, she’d have to rely on speed and agility. The standoff ended as Arya leaped at Jassaya, surprising the naga. Coming in low, she reached out quickly to skitter her fingers up the snake-woman’s side with curling, squeezing motions. Jassaya hissed and flinched away from the tickle, reaching out with a hand to bat the lithe woman away. Arya backed away quickly, staying out of reach of Jassaya’s grasp.

It had been a quick little tickle, but it had been important. That hiss and flinch was an unmistakable reaction: the naga was ticklish. And if she was ticklish, it was just a matter of finding the rights spots and methods to make her weak with hysterical laughter. Just the task for the Royal Tickler of Coninze… “What’s the matter? Is the big snake monster just a little bit… ticklish?” Arya taunted the other woman, becoming a bit more confident. Jassaya hissed angrily and moved forward, reaching an arm out to grab at Arya. But Arya dodged, ducking under the arm and darting her hand into the naga’s armpit, skittering quickly with her fingernails. “What about here? Ticklish under here?” Arya teased, putting all her skills into effect.

“Nahahaha! Gehehet out of thehere!” Jassaya giggled, retreating backwards and bringing down her arm. Her eyes narrowed as she looked at the human girl with more respect now, having underestimated her before. “Sss… I’ll teach you to treat a princess with more respect, girl!” Jassaya said threateningly, but a ticklish grin was still slightly visible on her lips, and the naga could still feel phantom fingernails gliding across the smooth hollows of her underarm.

“Funny, I get commanded to do this sort of thing for royalty all the time!” Arya replied, a more confident grin on her own face. She had a strategy now, and as long as she was careful, she could wear down the naga enough to get some real tickling in. Clearly she had discovered at least one good spot. Her sides had reacted to that quick little tickle quite well, and the underarm tickling had easily gotten some giggles. Maybe those weren’t even her weakest spots? Arya knew as well as anyone that strength did you no good when your muscles are turned to jelly from overwhelming tickles. Arya dashed in once more, this time reaching for Jassaya’s ribs and squeezing with both hands. But the naga’s tail moved quicker than she expected, trying to wrap around Arya from behind! She saw the movement out of the corner of her eye, rolling away to safety in the nick of time. Arya panted from the burst of adrenaline at the near miss, noting to herself that those ribs seemed to be a less receptive spot to target. Still, Arya put on a brave face. “It’s only a matter of time before I find all your weak spots, you know. You might as well just step into my hands now!”

“Ssss! Insolent woman, its only a matter of time before you fall into my grasp!” Jassaya said. She appeared confident still, but the quick tickles made her more cautious, as she eyed the human, debating whether to be defensive or try to close the distance between them. For her part, Arya was getting bolder, and eyeing the naga for her next opening.
1221131.title: Arya begins her run and tickle strategy

choices: Arya is dragged from Jassaya's back
Jassaya only succeeds in removing a boot.
12211312.content:
With her new found confidence Arya sneered at Jassaya’s threat. Pride came before a fall and the naga had it in spades. She just needed an opening to strike.

“Me? Fall into your grasp?” She scoffs, placing one hand on her hip. “By that point we’ll both be old and frail.” Her taunt earned her an angry hiss that only caused the grin on her lips to grow. “Honestly, I expected a challenge at least. They send me to fight a naga princess and I find a listless slug.”

Jassaya hissed again in anger. How dare this woman, a mere human no less, turn her, Princess Jassaya IV, into a laughing stock and mock her in this way? Enraged she reared back, drawing herself up to her full height and towering above Arya before pouncing forward with a speed that shouldn’t have come so easily from a creature of her size.

Unfortunately for the princess Arya had been anticipating an angry attack just like that. Even so it was only by a fraction of an inch that she managed to dive under the four outstretched hands that would’ve immobilized her if they caught hold of any part of her body. Landing outstretched in the sand, Arya pushed herself up before the naga could turn around to correct her overshoot. Thinking fast, but acting faster she swung a leg over Jassaya’s tail, straddling her scaly body just behind her human torso. From here, Arya knew, she could wreak all sorts of havoc.

Twisting and writhing, Jassaya fought to shake the royal tickler off her body. Before she lost her balance though, Arya wrapped her arms around the naga’s ribcage- left hand to right side, right hand to left side.

“I’m warning you human!” Jassaya growled, venom dripping from her words in more than a figurative sense. “I am not some mount to be ri-“

Arya had an idea of what the princess was about to say, but decided her breath was better spent laughing than threatening. Without further delay she dug her fingers into the naga’s sides. The reaction was instant and to her horror, Jassaya realized this was no quick, glancing tickle. As Arya readjusted to enter her lower right armpit and wriggled her fingers over ticklish flesh, the mighty princess through back her head in screamed with ticklish laughter.

“What’s the matter princess? Is a little human too much for you to handle?” Arya grinned as both hands entered her hollows, stroking incessantly the sensitive skin. The naga’s armpits were definitely her most ticklish spot, more so than her ribs. And Arya had four of them to explore- a worthy task for the royal tickler of Coninze.

Despite her twisting and tickle-induced spasms, Jassaya couldn’t throw off the little human on her back. In desperation she locked her arms against her sides in an effort to entrap her hands, but only succeeded in giving Arya an extra handhold on her body. This wasn’t supposed to happen! She was Princess Jassaya IV, protector of the kingdom and future queen. A little human was not supposed to beat her in a fight and shame her in front of-

And then coherent thought left her as one of Arya’s hands danced a ticklish path across her belly, before twirling into her belly-button. A hissing, hysterical laugh erupted from her lips as Arya wriggled her finger around inside the spot that had reduced her to an incoherent wreck.

Arya too knew that she’d found the spot. You didn’t need to be a professional tickler to figure it out and she knew that if she kept this up, Jassaya would be out sooner than she’d bet on. The naga swiped pitifully behind her, not quite flexible to reach her body and she responded back digging and wriggling the fingers of the left hand around her navel as her right, still pinned, wriggled around in her armpit.

“Sorry princess. But you’re too slow and too ticklish.” She teased. She didn’t expect a coherent reply back and she didn’t get one as she continued to press home the advantage, shifting her legs to readjust her position-

And instantly gasping as Jassaya’s tail coiled tightly around her leg.
12211312.title: Snake wrangling

choices: Jassaya discovers Arya's belly is also very ticklish!
Jassaya explores how ticklish human feet can be
Arya turns out to be wigglier and harder to hold onto than Jassaya expects
122113121.content:
Unfortunately for the royal tickler, her position on Jassaya's back wasn't invulnerable. While the naga wasn't able to reach backwards with her four arms to reach the nimble human, she still had a long tail capable of wrapping around a limb brought within its grasp. And even despite Jassaya's hysterical laughter and wriggling, she was still coherant enough to use her appendage effectively. As Arya shifted slightly lower on the naga's body, Jassaya took full advantage, reaching up with the tip of her tail to coil around Arya's ankle and calf.

Arya gasped as she found herself forcefully yanked off her perch, swinging around in the air. With a yelp she was spun around, the tail lifting high and brought in front of the naga. Now the royal tickler was hanging upside down, Jassaya's tail now coiling tightly around both the woman's lower legs.

Jassaya, still a little giggly from the earlier tickling, tried to regain her composure, looking down on her now vulnerable opponent. "Hsshshshs-hehehe… rrr!" Jassaya shook her head, finally able to stop giggling, although the giddy smile remained on her face. "I'll teach you the consequences of touching a naga princess without permission! Let's see how you take to being my plaything…"

Arya tried to struggle free, but quickly found her wrists grabbed by Jassaya's lower arms, pulling her downward. All Arya could do now was squirm in place, pulled taut and fully exposed before the vengeful serpent. Jassaya reached out with her upper arms, bringing them to Arya's knees, which were just at the princess's eye level. Her nails began to teasingly dance down Arya's thighs.

Arya instantly gasped and tried to hold in the building laughter. But those nails were perfectly manicured, the touch well tuned to be just soft enough, just forceful enough to be completely ticklish. And the Coninzian royal tickler was nothing if not completely ticklish. Her resistance lasting no more than a moment, she burst into girlish giggles, unable to hold in her reaction farther than those nails reaching mid-thigh.

"Ah, a ticklish spot already? I wonder just how ticklish you are, pretty little thing. I think I'll take my time finding out… it looks like you'll be hanging around for a while…" Jassaya teased, as her nails softly wiggled to Arya's upper thigh, getting a squeal of laughter as a result. The nails zig-zagged back down (or up? It was so hard to tell when you’re upside down) the smooth hairless thighs back towards Arya’s knees. The tickling was slower than it could have been, with Jassaya confident in her position and wanting to drag out her revenge on the girl.

And through her giggling, Arya’s mind was racing. Trying to focus despite how ticklish it felt to have those nails glide up and down her thighs took more than a little effort! Her ankles were gripped tightly in those snake coils, feeling like a solid wall of muscle. Meanwhile her wrists her held tightly by two strong hands, and in her ticklish state she was in no position to muscle her way free. All she seemed to be capable of doing was wiggling back and forth in the naga’s grasp, hanging there like the princess’s tickle toy. Through her laughter, she noticed she was hanging directly infront of the naga’s smooth, taut tummy. Knowing just how ticklish that skin was made it even worse. Her bellybutton was only inches away! But she couldn’t reach out to scribble over those sensitive sides, the soft ticklish skin of her tummy, to twirl a fingernail in that deliciously sensitive navel, to squeeze at those alluring hips swaying contentedly as Jassaya played with her…

Tickling was filling the royal tickler’s mind, but it was increasingly about the electric feeling of nails exploring her legs rather than inflicting it on her opponent. Jassaya had found that quick little scritches up and down Arya’s inner thighs produced the most delightful laughter, the royal tickler breaking down into rapid, high pitched giggles. What had seemed like a quick victory was looking like it might be shifting into a quick defeat, and Jassaya wasn't going to stop now...
122113121.title: Arya is dragged from Jassaya's back

1222.content:
Name: Bridgette the Youthful

Species: Human

Gender: Female

Appearance: Bridgette could be any other normal girl, with a quiet beauty about her. She has neck length hair, dyed a bright crimson and very lightly tanned skin. Her freckled face is always a little bit flushed, and a small pair of glasses sit on her cute, rounded face over her green eyes. She stands short at 5'4" (1.6m), and is slender and slim at 110 lbs (50 kg). She wears a thin red strapless belly shirt with no bra underneath that shows off her smooth, soft armpits and her small belly, a tiny black miniskirt that leaves little to the imagination, and slightly torn nylon stockings enveloping her pampered feet. She hates her outfit.

Ticklish spots: Soles (8/10) and Toes (9/10), Belly (8/10), Breasts (9/10), Armpits (11/10!)

Ticklishness: 100/100

Endurance: 15/100

Adult: Yes

Other: Bridgette is a young occultist, blessed to remain young so long as she keeps her deity pleased with her. Most Eldritch Lords are harsh and cruel, demanding pain and bloodshed and human souls, but Bridgette got off lucky when she came across Aezvia. Aezvia blessed Bridgette with eternal youth, but Bridgette should have realized that she had made a deal with the Eldritch Mistress of Tickling. Luckily, Aezvia is not cruel, only in need of... entertainment. Bridgette was left cursed with terrible ticklishness, especially on her already terribly sensitive underarms, but was left far from defenseless, with powers of restraint and tickling of her own. As part of the deal she made with Aezvia, Bridgette entered the tickling tournament. Maybe Aezvia just wants to watch Bridgette squirm and beg and suffer under the tickling fingers of the whole world... or maybe she wants to test the powers she's bestowed on her newest acolyte!
1222.title: Challenger 2

choices: The cat catches the mouse, Jassaya playfully tickling her prey.
Bridgette isn't completely defenseless, and scores the first tickle!
Eldritch powers come in handy when you're face to face with a giant snake lady
12221.content:
Jassaya moved out of the tunnel and into the arena. She scanned the area for the first time: a classical looking coliseum with a circular arena. Large pillars were erected in four locations, holding up nothing but giving the contestants something to maneuver around. There were no corners, but one could still be easily backed into one of the columns or a wall if they weren’t careful. The seats filled with what seemed to be wealthy people looking for some entertainment. Jassaya grinned to herself and vowed to give them a good show.

Then she saw her opponent enter from the opposite side. “Hmph, just a human?” Jassaya blurted derisively, loud enough for the other woman to hear. “They must not have wanted a fair fight, did they?” With a confident grin, Jassaya slithered forward, moving slowly but gracefully to the center and closing the distance between the two. The two paused, eyeing each other from about ten feet apart. Jassaya straightened herself up, standing tall on her tail and stretching. “Girl, do you really think you have a chance against someone like me? You might as well just step into my coils now!”

The other woman said nothing, but took on a defensive posture. Jassaya thought she seemed to be mumbling something, but whether it was just grumbling about her fate or something else, the naga couldn’t determine. With a shrug, the serpent princess decided this girl was just a lamb thrown to the lioness, something to entertain the crowd. And Jassaya vowed to give them a good show. The naga slithered forward confidently, arms outstretched in order to grasp her ticklish victim…
12221.title: Let the tickling begin!

choices: The tendrils suddenly free Jassaya, leaving her free to get her revenge
Little helpers come from the abyss to make the tickling worse
122213.content:
Bridgette's nigh-unpronounceable chants got a lot more panicked as Jassaya got closer and closer. Each syllable was a complex oral exercise, and each had to be pronounced perfectly, or who knows WHAT the consequences could be?! Bridgette really wasn't much of a combative person at all, but the Naga's taunting snapped her into reality quickly: if those slithereen coils wrapped the smaller girl up, then the Naga may never have to stop tickling and teasing her! A nightmarish image in her mind of her arms coiled overheard, accompanied by an imaginary feeling of the cold breeze on her tender armpits, drove Bridgette through her chant, a plea of assistance from Aezvia, as Jassaya came closer to making that nightmare a reality.

The last syllable passed Bridgette's soft lips, and black tendrils materialized nearly instantaneously in midair, seeming to just flow into existence at some point, which shoot to envelop Jassaya! The thin wiry tendrils wrap themselves around the Naga's wrists, forearms, and elbows, stopping her fingers just inches from the redhead's defenseless tummy. More tendrils come in short order, coiling themselves around Jassaya's body, even her forehead, and her long tail, and in one sweeping motion they all pull her back upon a wall of darkness that materialized. Her arms are enveloped, as is her tail, leaving only her horrendously sensitive torso exposed. The tendrils all began to shift slightly as Bridgette sighed in relief and takes a few steps forward, getting into position almost right on top of the Naga's human half, held completely immobile against the wall. Her relief soon gave way to irritation as her nails took position atop her prey's underarms, and she leaned in to the Princess's immobile ear and said "You may as well step into my coils now!" in a stage whisper for the audience, and let her nails start tracing up and down the skin above her armpits, building anticipation. Jassaya's determined eyes, if watched carefully, would show a flash of concern...

Bridgette had, at Aezvia's advising, become rather practiced with her fingerwork. Leading up to this tournament, she even took to using her powers to kidnap and tickle people to tears and begging and beyond as a form of training. While she's fairly new to breaking the strongest of wills with only tickling, she is far from incapable. Her nails continued their teasing stroking and seamlessly transitioned into tickle torturing her ensnared prey's pits, using her first two fingers to tap out a figure-8 on the smooth hollows.

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHUUMAHAHAHAN!! HAHAHAHAHAHAHA!! ILLGEHEHEHETYOUHUHUHUSOOHOHOON!!!" Jassaya threatened through her laughter.
"Princess, that's a very naughty thing for you to say! Naughty little girls like you get punished for threatening me!" Bridgette shot back, while her other fingers joined in, stroking and wiggling in the smooth underarms. "I'm going to make you beg me to let you apologize for those nasty threats you made to me!"
Bridgette was giggling along with her opponent as she kept the armpit tickling up, teasing Jassaya so the crowd could hear, hoping for a quick win. However, she was so caught up in the Naga's beautiful laughter that she didn't quite remember that at the very end of her incantation, she had a slip of the tongue as she yelped in fear. Unintended consequences are sure to follow...
122213.title: A Surprising Reversal

choices: Jassaya reaches her first, and now has her own restrained captive to tickle
The tendrils disappear, and its back to square one.
Bridgette chants a new spell, hopefully correctly this time.
1222133.content:
Bridgette giggled to herself as she continued to tease and tickle the naga’s underarms. Her arms were stretched out and pulled taut by the tentacles, completely exposing her underarms to even the gentlest tickling. The skin there was silky smooth and wonderfully responsive to the soft stroking of fingernails. The naga laughed unreservedly, unable to hold back loud giggles as Bridgette explored every millimeter of the vulnerable spot with her nails, teasing with an experienced touch.

But the occultist was so focused on tickling her beautiful opponent that she became completely unaware of her surroundings. More black tendrils appeared out of the ether, this time grabbing Bridgette in the same way they had retrained Jassaya. “Ah! What the-!” Bridgette yelped as the strong appendages pulled her off the vulnerable naga, pulling her onto her own black wall. Tentacles restrained all her limbs, leaving the two restrained and eyeing each other with some frustration. Bridgette realized that she had bungled the ending of her spell, and the tendrils weren’t given a target, just a purpose: restraint. And they had done so on anything in the vicinity.

“Hmph! Some bumbling witch you are!” Jassaya sneered, after a long moment of recovering from the lingering feeling of tickles under her arms. “Just wait until I get out of this, then I’ll teach you a lesson!” Bridgette looked on in increasing concern as the naga pulled at the tendrils. At first this seemed to be futile, but the naga was quite strong, and Bridgette saw the tendrils stretching and giving under the strain of Jassaya’s powerful tail and arms. Bridgette tried her best to tug her own way out, but she wasn’t nearly as strong. There was no way she’d be able to break free before the naga could. And she didn’t have much time, those tendrils were bring strained to the breaking point now that Jassaya wasn’t being distracted by being tickled.

Bridgette realized she’d have to magic her way out of this one. But how? She could undo the spell, putting both combatants back at square one… which still left her at a disadvantage. Could she replace the spell with something? There was no time to think, the growling naga tensing and pulling free, and so Bridgette began another chant...
1222133.title: More tendrils suddenly wrap Bridgette

choices: Couldn't get away, letting the Princess get her revenge!
Used a VERY unpredicatable, desperate tickle spell
Tried to scamper around the pillar at the last moment
12221332.content:
Bridgette realized that she was in dire straits very quickly. She slowly and calmly chanted, doing her best to remain collected and relaxed as Jassaya very violently pulled and tore at the tendrils, all while taunting the poor Acolyte.
"Your body looks so soft! So smooth and tender!"
"There's another one! I'm almost there!"
"I can almost feel your armpits under my fingers! Can you feel it too? It's so close, dear."

As Jassaya flexed her tail mightily, it became clear that these bonds would not hold her for much longer at all, and Bridgette finished her cancellation incantation, dropping both women. Jassaya, being a Naga, didn't really fall down at all. Bridgette was not so lucky. Jassaya hissed and lunged for Bridgette, who let out a fearful squeak and started to scamper away. Jassaya missed her prey's ankle, but wound up scraping her nails up Bridgette's nylon-clad feet, elicited a couple of cute giggles from the girl. Jassaya grinned as Bridgette, eyes widened in fear behind her tiny glasses, pushed herself away fearfully on the ground. Once the Princess gets a grip on Bridgette, it could well be a round spent getting tickle tortured to the brink!

Bridgette suddenly bumped her back into a pillar, and realized that there was nowhere for her to back up to. Bridgette had to do something very quickly, but a short incantation is incredibly... unspecific. Jassaya grinned down on her prey, and lunged, fully intent on coiling and immobilizing the smaller girl. Bridgette, eyes wide in fear...
12221332.title: You Know What They Say about Desperate Times...

choices: The wisps discover how ticklish a naga's belly can be!
The wisps wiggle under Bridgette's arms, and find a favorite tickle toy!
The wisps find both of their weak spots, and neither woman seems to be winning
122213322.content:
Bridgette chanted quickly, arcane words spilling out of her as fast as she could mouth them. Without even thinking, she had called out the shortest spell she knew. And the moment she finished, a bright flash throughout the arena made Jassaya stop in her tracks. The naga was close enough now to lunge at her prey, wrapping her in coils with four hands to tickle her into oblivion. But the princess knew something had happened, and was cautious…

As the flash died down, there seemed to be several black balls hanging in the air, about the size of a bumblebee. The fluffy looking spheres seemed to hum and buzz with some kind of strange energy. And then Bridgette realized with a sense of dread what she had done: she had summoned tickle wisps. And she definitely hadn’t had time to assign them a target. The little monsters were free to do whatever they wanted. And whatever they wanted was to hone in on any ticklish flesh in sight.

Moving with impressive speed, the wisps darted at the two combatants, dividing themselves into roughly equal number. Given her size, Jassaya seemed to draw a few more, attracted to the taller expanse of ticklish skin. The little wisps zipped in, nestling themselves against bare skin and vibrating with a wavelength that seemed perfectly tuned to tickle.

Bridgette had only a second to prepare, and brought her arms down tightly and wrapped them around her chest. But she couldn’t protect herself fully, and a pair of wisps attached themselves to her sides, rolling up and down her bare skin in a way that made her gasp and wiggle side to side in a futile attempt to escape their touch. Another honed in on her bellybutton, and jiggled inside, seeming to roll around in the little space in tight circles. Still two more found their way underneath Bridgette’s top. While most of her chest was carefully guarded by her arms, the smooth undersides of her breasts were vulnerable, and the wisps eagerly rubbed up against them, brushing and humming. Bridgette squealed in loud laughter and fell to the ground, rolling around but not daring to move her arms lest the wisps find even more ticklish spots.

Jassaya was in just as much trouble. Four tickling hands were a strength, but four ticklish underarms were a vulnerability, one that attracted four wisps to an underarm each. Jassaya hissed in surprise and tried not to laugh… but the feeling of being tickled in four underarms at once is not something easily resisted, and Jassaya writhed and burst into girlish giggles. For a large monster, the way she curled and giggled and tried to swat at the speedy little things was actually quite cute, if Bridgette had had the ability to observe such things. Two more wisps played with the sides of the naga’s breasts not covered by her black bikini garment, fuzzily rubbing up and down. Jassaya didn’t seem to know what to do, unable to bat the little wisps away, but unable to protect herself now that they were firmly nestled under her arms. Zander simply grinned and kept up the tickles relentlessly, though he tried to ignore the feeling in his midsection from seeing Zochi's smooth thighs and curves waving from side to side. Just keep your head in the game and win it he thought.

Meanwhile, Zochi managed to lithely jump forward, out of the reach of the brush-staff. Panting heavily but glad her worst spots weren't hit, Zochi turned to face her opponent and form a plan. Now that she knew where he was she was confident her imp instincts and deviousness could do some damage.

1411311121.content:
Zochi gritted her teeth as she stared back at the human and his long weapon. He had gotten in the first strike! And gotten her to squirm and giggle... Zochi decided she shouldn't underestimate this human. While this man might be bigger, stronger, and have the advantage of long range, Zochi had her own advantages over him as well. The imp's grimace turning into a grin, she hopped back and to the side, hiding behind a broad pillar.

Zander pursued, feeling like he had the upper hand. He moved around the other side of the pillar, looking to meet her head on, his long brush at the ready to tickle across her midsection. "You can't hide from me, demon! By the end of this tournament, I'll be victorious and you'll be banished back to-!"

But Zander had miscalculated. Zochi had quickly doubled back around the pillar, and Zander had fallen right into her feint. Zochi leapt onto Zander's back, wrapping a hand around his neck. She leaned in and whispered into the man's ear. "Don't you think you're getting ahead of yourself, human? After all, we're only getting started. I want to have a lot more fun with you..." Zochi's free hand moved down and began squeezing and wriggling against Zander's ribs, starting her counterattack.

Zander immediately started twisting away from the tickling feeling and trying to throw off the demonic creature. But he immediately noticed some aspects of the situation that weren't so bad: the woman's bare skin was pressed against him, her chest rubbing against his shoulders and her bare thighs wrapped around his waist alluringly. And he hadn't noticed before, but she had a pleasant scent to her, smelling more like a field of roses than a sulfur and brimstone. He was almost enjoying... No! I can't think like that! Focus: You already know she's ticklish!

"Ah! Hahahaha- Gehehet off mehehehehe, foul creatu-huhuhuhure!" Zander looked down, and realized those smooth, exposed thighs made for a tickle target. Through his laughter, as well as other distractions, he reached down with both hands wiggling... But Zochi noticed what he was doing. She had to keep one hand around the man's neck to hold on, compared to his tickling two: not a recipe for victory, and the imp wasn't sure she'd be able to win such a contest. Zochi lithely hopped off of the man, tactically retreating before he could get in his own tickles, kicking off as she leapt to safety.

"Aw, you don't like me on top of you?" Zochi asked suggestively. "If you surrender now, I'll promise to be gentle with you..." Zochi stood just outside the range of Zander's brush, the two facing each other now. Zochi had gotten him to inhale some of that perfume, and was curious to see how much it would affect him. The two began to circle each other, looking for an opening to make the next strike.

choices: The blast hits Zochi, negatively affecting her
The blast hits Zochi, positively affecting her
The blast creates a new variable (spawns a tool, summons things, etc)
14113111211.content:
Zander took a step forward, preparing for a lunge, but stumbled forward as soon as his foot made contact with the sand. His vision was just a little bit fuzzy, and everything had taken on a slight pink haze. He coughed, realizing that the imp's pleasant scent still filled his nostrils. It must be some kind of spell or something... or her perfume... he thought.

Zochi the imp looked at her faltering opponent and realized her weapon was taking effect. He's already losing his concentration she thought. But his dose isn't big enough yet! Perhaps I can sway him into making a foolish move... Zochi bent forward, thrusting out her chest and ass in a vulgar display to the pious man. "Heh heh, come here and get it, big boy!" she purred, delighting in watching the mixed disgust and attraction splayed across his conflicted face.

Meanwhile, Zander was having trouble making up his mind. He was having to fight a little to keep the sensations in his head at bay, sensations which ever so slightly pushed him into thinking of things he had been forbidden to think. However, one thing he could make sense of was that he needed to tickle back. He was glad for picking his long staff, because although he wasn't sure exactly what it was, his senses told him it would be unwise to get in close to the imp. Then he remembered the name of his weapon: the Staff of Unknown Fortunes.

He recalled that the description for his item had said that the staff could fire blasts of magical energy, with untold results. Zander wasn't exactly sure what the results would be, but it wouldn't hurt to try and he could stay back and recuperate his strength; as it was; Zochi the Imp looked like she was about to strike. With that thought, Zander pointed his staff at her, tensed, and fired his weapon.
14113111211.title: Zander begins to feel the effect of the perfume

choices: Having recovered from the tickle magic, Zochi moves in
141131112111.content:
In an instant, a million possibilities flashed through Zander's mind- millions of solutions and problems and variables to affect the situation- then he heard a loud noise as a blast of blue-hued magic pulsed from the Staff of Unknown Fortunes and hit Zochi right in the stomach, blasting her off her feet as she uttered a loud cry. She hit the ground and slid, coming to a rest on her side, shaking from side to side as big belly laughs worked their way out her. The blast must have been imbued with intense tickling power Zander thought incredulously.

Zochi's imp reflexes had been far too slow for the bolt of tickle magic- it had hit her square in her midsection and tossed her to the floor. She had nary a second to dwell on her reflexes, however, because a millisecond after coming to a rest she felt what felt like fingers prodding and kneading her belly. "Wha-ha-nohohoho!" she shrieked as she struggled to escape from the feeling on her stomach, which felt like thin, pointy yet strong fingers sinking deep into the soft flesh of her tummy and wiggling, sending electric shock feelings through her as the blast's effects sunk in. She gasped and her heart skipped a beat as she felt phantom fingers form into claws and drill into her the soft red pockets of her hips.

As Zochi thrashed about in the background, trying to pry invisible fingers from her waist, tummy, and ribs, Zander took a moment to breathe. It would be no good to attack without recovery from her strange scent, and he didn't want to risk getting any of that potent magic on him. Gradually, Zander felt the overbearing feeling of arousal and lightheadedness ease away as he leaned up against a column. He wasn't sure how he could possibly avoid her pleasing pheromone power for too long, but for now he was safe.

Gradually, Zochi felt the tickle spell wear off, leaving her gasping for breath as she clutched at her stomach. It still felt like the tickly hands were there, at least slightly. She staggered to her feet, realizing she'd underestimated the power of Zander's weapon. Of course... she thought. It must be the Staff of Unknown Fortunes, and I just got really unlucky. At the very least, Zochi realized the chances of Zander getting the exact same effect from his staff again was one in a million. But now she felt a little inadequate...he got a giant paintbrush and a magical staff while she had to make do with just her perfume.

But, Zochi had never been one for dwelling on inadequacies. And she was confident she would have the upper hand in a hand to hand tickle fight.

1521111.content:
There had to be a dozen different showgrounds and rooms to choose from but, for some reason, all the events seemed to take place in the same gladiatorial arena- apparently nobody was sick of pillars and sand yet.

This time the two subjects for the ticklers’ duel were bound facing each other about twenty feet apart. Their arms were raised and bound high above their heads to the top of the pillars they were backed into. Unable to move the two were stuck here until the inevitable moment the gates opened and the ‘fun’ began.

Well- began for the crowd.

Miranda looked about nervously around the crowd then at her opponent. She couldn’t not think of her as an opponent because there was the matter of her freedom and possibly soul riding on her winning this contest. On paper it seemed easy- outlasting a girl who’d been sensitized by a tickle dragon for years who was being tormented by a harpy. It got a bit harder when you remembered she loved being tickled- begged for it Miranda had heard.

Meanwhile a demoness literally hell-bent on making Miranda her pet was going to be doing everything she could to make her lose. Not so easy in practice.

For her part Alexandria was buzzing with nervous anticipation. She had heard of, but never experienced the touch of a harpy. The closest she had come was the Princess drawing a harpy feather along her side one evening in her chambers. All she remembered was going wild as the Princess lazily dragged the feather up and down her ribs and across her midriff. What two whole wings felt like- well she’d find out soon enough.
1521111.title: Lees in waiting

choices: The ticklers are busy getting to know each other as well
The ticklers enter, slowly approaching their victims
The ticklers jump in, giving their lees no time to prepare!
15211111.content:
The two ticklees hung comfortably in their bondage waiting for their ticklers to arrive. Although they seemed to be taking their time… either to make their entrance more dramatic or to come up with some even more fiendish way to tickle them, neither could figure. But it left both of them some time for contemplation, and eventually Miranda turned to Alexandria and asked “Uh… so, have you ever felt a harpy feather on your skin before?”

Alexandria turned to her opposite and grinned. “Only once, and that was just a single feather. But one was more than enough to make me laugh no matter how softly it moved over my skin. It was a unique experience, almost unbelievable how something so small and soft can tickle so much. I can’t imagine what the whole wing will feel like, especially one attached to an actual harpy! And I’ve heard the great southern harpies are some of the most impressive of their kind. Hmm….” For a moment, Alexandria’s mind seemed to go elsewhere, staring off into the middle-distance and trying to picture what was to come. But then she focused again, and looked back at Miranda. “Why, have you ever been under the harpy’s feather?”

“Me? No, never!” Miranda said quickly. “I’ve been adventuring for some time, but I’ve never encountered harpies before. Naga, mermaids, demons, sure… but never a harpy.”

Alexandria nodded, then grinned suggestively. “Ah, so what is it liked to be tickled by a demon? There hasn’t been a demon in Coninze for centuries, and I imagine they only find their way to our world in more lawless lands. What are they like?”

Miranda shivered, now remembering. “I’ve only run into her the one time, which is exactly how I got into this predicament. She’s… something else. Devious, seductive, powerful. Once she’s got her eye on you there’s no getting away. And she seems to know just where to…” Miranda trailed off, shaking her head as Miranda’s smile widened. “But she gave me a chance. She likes playing games, so we ended up here. If I can win, I get to go free. But if I lose… well, I’m hers.”

“I see. I’d help you out, but I have a reputation to maintain.” Alexandria replied, somewhat hesitantly. “And besides, if I give in too quickly, who knows the next time I’ll get to be tickled by a harpy! And if I win, I’ll get to tickle your demoness! That sounds like it could be pretty fun, too!” Miranda’s eyes widened at Alexandria’s tickle-gluttony, wondering what kind of person would want to prolong their time stretched out and vulnerable under a harpy’s touch. Miranda was growing anxious, while Alexandria was practically buzzing with anticipation.
15211111.title: Time for Tickle Talk

choices: The tickling begins, slow and teasing
The demoness and the harpy take two different approaches
152111112.content:
The inevitable happened and with a sense of dread, Miranda watched the gates to her left and right open to reveal the contestants for the crowd to cheer. She gave the restraints that held her arms up one final defiant tug- just to make sure she hadn’t missed a way to get out of this nightmare. But she hadn’t. All she could hope for now was to outlast the girl opposite her and hope that the harpy feathers were more than she bargained for.

Dathra, tall and elegant stepped out into the bright light of the arena. She took her time looking up into the crowd around her, soaking in the attention that was being bestowed upon her. And then, smiling a predatory smile she made her way to where Miranda and Alexandria were bound in the center of the arena, hips swinging and one hand placed on her shapely hip. However, instead of stalking toward Miranda, the demoness instead set her sights on Alexandria.

Alex writhed in anticipation as a premature giggle escaped her lips. Slowly, teasingly, Dathra extended a single black nail to her tanned forearm and slowly stroked down into her armpit, causing the girl to snicker and squirm at the ticklish sensations. Smiling equally broadly herself Dathra knelt down next to her, bringing her lips close to her ear.

“The things I would do to you if we were alone.” She whispered with a sultry tone.

“Ihe can imaghine.” Alexandria giggled as she tried to meet the demoness’ gaze.

“Oh little one.” Dathra replied, her fingers reaching down for the bound girl’s sides and trailing them down to her hips as she writhed and snickered in ticklish euphoria. “You cannot even begin to imagine.” With a final tweak at her sides Dathra stood up and left Alexandria to deal with the phantom tingling that lingered longer than usual on her skin. As the harpy finally closed in on the centre of the arena, impeded by the terrain, her webbed feet and the rule banning flight, the demoness came to stand in front of Miranda- leering over her with a look of hunger on her face.

“And don’t worry.” She purred softly, cupping Miranda’s chin with her hand. “You and I will be all alone. Very, very soon.”

“You’ll get no such satisfaction out of me.” Miranda growled in the only act of defiance she could make.

“Oh don't concern yourself, my little pet.” Dathra replied with a smirk. “The pleasure will be all mine.”
152111112.title: Enter the ticklers

The harpy feathers find a hot-spot on Alexandria she didn't know she had!
Both ticklers continue what they're doing, teasing all the while
1521111123.content:
Axa looked down at Alexandria, examining her tickle target for the first time. “What a lovely little human they gave me!” She cooed in a soft voice, half speaking to herself and only half to Alexandria. “Now, where is it that the pretty girl is most ticklish, hmm?” The harpy mused, stepping up to Alexandria, who could only grin and shivered anticipation at the question.

“Oh, just about everywhere. You’ll find out in just a mome-hehehehent!” Alexandria replied, bursting out into giggles. The harpy didn’t waste any time, and had begun to curiously brush her wings across Alexandria’s bare, tan tummy. The exposed midriff fluttered and sucked in instinctively, doing absolutely no good as the feathers easily followed. The touch was just as bad as the tickle dragons, maybe even more ticklish! Somehow even the softest touch of those feathers was incredibly ticklish, the softest grazing as effective as that time Arya was experimenting with blowing raspberries over Alexandria’s bellybutton…

Meanwhile, the demoness had taken a much more patient approach. Instead of starting right with a tickle, Dathra was slowly massaging Miranda’s skin. Starting at feet and moving northward, she was rubbing her palms up and down her body in firm, non-ticklish strokes. Dathra knelt next to her victim, her body pressed into Miranda’s legs as her hands sensually massaged the other woman’s thighs. “How does this feel, mortal? See, I can be quite benevolent to my humans. Doesn’t this feel oh-so-nice? I’ll let you feel good before I have to tickle you into submission…” Dathra told Miranda in a silky voice.

Miranda was confused and wary by the whole thing. The demoness wasn’t even tickling yet, even though her opponent already had her ticklee giggling like mad! Was she deliberately throwing the fight in order to be tickled by the harpy herself? No, Miranda didn’t believe it, there had to be some trickery. She willed herself to ignore the massaging touch. But despite herself, she knew in her mind it was having an effect. Miranda felt her body relaxing, her muscles softening from the expert touch as the warm hands seemed to know just where to move in order to pleasurably relax her. Those hands moved up and down her exposed stomach and sides, but still didn’t tickle! Miranda waited with anticipation, expecting each new touch to be the one where fingers curled, and Dathra finally moved in for the kill. But those cat eyes only stared back at her patiently, her palms touching her here… and there… and right there… in some kind of pattern Miranda couldn’t figure out.

All the while Axa tickled, her feathers brushing softly but ticklishly up and down Alexandria’s body. Axa seemed to be exploring, hunting for a spot that responded to the feather more than others. But so far Alexandria was giggling constantly but consistently. She had a broad smile on her face, not even trying to hold in her laughter as one wing stroked her sides, then the other… and the harpy realized that the human was having a wonderful time! The creature was actually loving the feel of her ticklish feathers! It was an interesting problem to have. Normally, this would be a wonderful discovery, but the harpy was here to win… it was a new challenge for the tall bird-woman, and thought about her next move, never stopping her wings...

info.brief_description: The tickling competition of the century!
info.description:
Greetings and welcome all to the second ever Tickle Tournament! After the first one, made by MidnightWolf, was such a huge success (over 725 chapters!) that I decided to make a sequel to free up more space for new scenarios and characters.

Want to prove your worth and claim victory in the tickling bout of the ages? Enter the Tickling Arena and prove your mettle against a varied group of contenders of different races, species, genders, and skill levels. The rules are:

1. You can use wrestling/fighting moves, but no killing or serious injury allowed.
2. Sexual tickling is definitely allowed.
3. Most fetishes are allowed, provided the other contender agrees, with the exception of gore, scat related stuff, and necro.
4. You lose if you give up and surrender, but that doesn't mean the winner has to stop tickling.
5. It's not required, but creativity is encouraged so try not to only use one character!

Create your contender like in the old one but with a couple changes:

1. Name-
2. Species-
3. Gender-
4. Appearance-
5. Most Ticklish Spots-
6. Ticklishness (0-100) and Endurance (0-100)-
7. Adult tickler (required for explicit scenarios)-
8. Other facts/info about your contender: their life story, secret weaknesses, etc-

With these rules set out, have fun and enter the Tournament!
